types.Help: Advance to the occupation named as 'destination'. Player enters immediately.
Advance to the occupation chosen by the player. Player enters immediately.
Advance to the border square named as 'destination'. Subsequent player action depends on the landing square.
Advance to any border square chosen by the player. Subsequent player action depends on the landing square.
Non-movement player action. There are three action types: extra_turn, leave_unemployment, collect_experience.
Advance to the nearest Amtrak station and roll again.
Advance to the nearest Opportunity space and roll again.

cards.text: OPPORTUNITY to become a VentureCapitalist. Meet Normal Requirements.
OPPORTUNITY to work in QuantumComputing. Meet Normal Requirements.
OPPORTUNITY to work in the Pharmaceutical Sciences. Meet Normal Requirements.
OPPORTUNITY to work in Aerospace Engineering. Meet Normal Requirements.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to work in Aerospace Engineering because of your technical brilliance. All expenses paid and no prior experience required.
OPPORTUNITY to be a Tech Entrepreneur. Meet Normal Requirements.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to be a Tech Entrepreneur because of your technical background. DOUBLE all Happiness earned. Meet Normal Requirements.
OPPORTUNITY to join AI Research team. Meet Normal Requirements
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to join AI Research team because of your technical brilliance. All expenses paid and no prior experience required.
OPPORTUNITY to work in Video Game Development. Meet Normal Requirements
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to work in Video Game Development because of your problem solving skills. All expenses paid and no prior experience required.
OPPORTUNITY to work in Broadcast Journalism. nMeet Normal Requirements
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to work in Broadcast Journalism because of your global perspective. All expenses paid and no prior experience required.
OPPORTUNITY to enter Pinnacle Polytechnic Institute. Meet Normal Requirements.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to enter Pinnacle Polytechnic Institute on Scholarship, all expenses paid.
OPPORTUNITY to be a Patent Attorney. Meet Normal Requirements
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to be a Patent Attorney because of your legal reputation. All expenses paid.
GOLDEN  OPPORTUNITY to join the Profession of your choice. Meet Normal Requirements.
GOLDEN  OPPORTUNITY to advance to ANY border square. Meet normal requirements for Profession or College entrance*
OPPORTUNITY to buy Insurance. Advance to the Insurance Store and pay $5,000 premium.
OPPORTUNITY to go on Spring Break!
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to collect needed cash! Advance to PAYDAY and collect DOUBLE your annual salary.
OPPORTUNITY to Gamble in Las Vegas.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to buy needed padding! Advance to EXPERIENCE square and buy at least 1 and up to 3 EXPERIENCE cards.
TRAVEL OPPORTUNITY Advance to the nearest rail Station and roll again.
OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS. Advance to the nearest OPPORTUNITY square and roll again
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to gain EXPERIENCE! Collect one randomly selected EXPERIENCE card from each player.
Get out of Unemployment free. Play this card to immediately leave Unemployment.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to Get an Extra Turn. Play at the start of your turn.
TRAVEL OPPORTUNITY Advance to the nearest Airport and roll again.
